With rumors swirling around Westminster earlier this week that Mr. Andy Coulson had already offered to resign, the prime minister publicly expressed full confidence in his aide. Trent Cole finished second in the league in total defeats, defined as the total number of plays by a defensive player that prevents the offense from gaining first-down yardage on third or fourth down, stops the offense behind the line of scrimmage or results in a turnover. Trent Cole had 26 defeats, second to only Justin Tuck . Jason Babin finished third. And Quintin Mikell finished third among safeties with nine run defeats.
